### Prerequisites

- [X] Write a descriptive title.

- [X] Refer to [Differences between Windows PowerShell 5.1 and PowerShell](https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/scripting/whats-new/differences-from-windows-powershell).

### Steps to reproduce

# Issue

* Got a message to upgrade to `7.2.5`
* I installed using Microsoft Store, so I need to update using it as well
* I don't get an upgrade option (see screenshot)

### Expected behavior

```console
To be able to upgrade 7.2.4 to 7.2.5 using Microsoft Store
```


### Actual behavior

```console
I'm forced to uninstall everything (and lose my customization) then re-install 7.2.5
```


### Environment data

```powershell
n/a
```


### OS Data

```powershell
Windows 11 Enterprise
```


### Windows update log

```markdown
see screenshot
```
